mapper.select: SELECT MEM_ID, MEM_TYPE, MEM_NAME, MEM_USERID, MEM_PW, MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL, MEM_VISIBLE, MEM_CHG_DATE, MEM_REV_COUNT FROM MEMBER WHERE MEM_USERID = #{MEM_USERID}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER( MEM_ID, MEM_TYPE, MEM_NAME, MEM_USERID, MEM_PW, MEM_PHONE, MEM_EMAIL ) VALUES( SEQ_MEM_ID.NEXTVAL, #{MEM_TYPE}, #{MEM_NAME}, #{MEM_USERID}, #{MEM_PW}, #{MEM_PHONE}, #{MEM_EMAIL} )
